message: Toue lifts a hand and snaps his fingers.
One of the guards behind him steps forward.

name: 東江
message: "I didn't want to have to use force... but I'm afraid you're my last hope. I can't leave empty-handed."
The guard slowly spreads his arms and takes a deep breath, almost like an opera singer getting ready to perform.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Wait."
And then, the guard actually starts to sing.
A slow and high, yet somehow disquieting melody fills the room.
Pain suddenly flares in my skull.
The world spins and the floor feels like it's undulating beneath me. I can barely stand.
What's going on?!

name: ミンク
message: "...Ngh, this song..."
It's affecting Mink too?! What the hell kind of song is it?!
Toue laughs from behind the singing guard.

name: 東江
message: "Time for an experiment. How long can you endure?"
His words seem to twist in the air. His features melt and flow together.
Can't... hold on...
The song floods my mind, echoing through my head...
I can't think.
Through my blurring vision, I see Mink stagger.
Mink...
